body.raw:
# Link

Links are accessible elements used primarily for navigation. This component is styled to resemble a
hyperlink and semantically renders an `<a>`.

## Import

```jsx live=false
import { Link } from '@totejs/uikit';
```

## Usage

```jsx
<Link>I'm a Link</Link>
```

### External Link

```jsx
<Link href="https://www.baidu.com" isExternal>
  go to baidu
  <LinkIcon mx="2px" />
</Link>
```

## Colors

```jsx
function Example() {
  return (
    <VStack alignItems="flex-start">
      {['primary', 'success', 'warning', 'danger'].map((item) => (
        <Link colorScheme={item} href="" key={item}>
          {item} Link
        </Link>
      ))}
    </VStack>
  );
}
```

## Props

<PropsTable
  data={[
    {
      name: 'colorShceme',
      required: false,
      type: '"primary" | "success" | "danger" | "warning"',
      default: '"primary"',
      desc: 'The color of link',
    },
    {
      name: 'isExternal',
      required: false,
      type: 'boolean',
      default: false,
      desc: 'If true, the link will open in new tab',
    },
  ]}
/>
